purpose: The email is a call for papers for the PROFES 2025 conference, inviting submissions of high-quality research related to software development processes and their impact on software product quality. It outlines the aims and scope of the conference, the topics of interest for submissions, and provides important details such as the submission deadline and conference dates. The email encourages contributions from software engineering professionals to discuss innovations and challenges in the field.

infos:
Subject: Call for Papers – PROFES 2025 Research Papers Track
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>

Date:Sat, 17 May 2025 12:30:20 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
